altTitles.en: ぬるくなるまで待って

description.en: When Icchan's bathroom goes on the fritz, his coworker Junpei invites him to use the one at his place, but when they end up drunk and kiss on the second night, they enter into a physical relationship. The next day, Junpei's excited about going "all the way" with Icchan, but upon mentioning the name of an ex-coworker named Tsujii, Icchan's expression instantly changes, suggesting there was something between the two men. Junpei ends up not being able to get it up and Icchan leaves to return to his own home.

biography.en:
Alternative names: 135 Special (NOBARA Aiko), 135special (のばらあいこ), Aiko Nobara, Нобара Айко, 野薔薇愛子

Circle(s): 135special
Prefered Kanji: 野薔薇愛子

Has been friends with Fujiwara Beni for over 20 years.

She likes Kishimen, Chikyuu Boueigun 2 and the 90s. She says that she lacks physical strength and planning ability.

Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=14711)
